scripts.setup: npm run setup:prisma && npm run install:all
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/ingestion-service && npm install && cd ../notification-api && npm install && cd ../processing-service && npm install && cd ../social-api && npm install && cd ../email-service && npm install && cd ../sms-service && npm install && cd ../socket-service && npm install
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/ingestion-service && npm run build && cd ../notification-api && npm run build && cd ../processing-service && npm run build && cd ../social-api && npm run build && cd ../email-service && npm run build && cd ../sms-service && npm run build && cd ../socket-service && npm run build
